roleset.name: augur, bode

example.name: plot device
example.text: The new reports of sluggishness , which [*T*-2]-1 were foreshadowed [*-1] by an earlier Labor Department report that manufacturing payrolls dropped by 105,000 in September , give the Fed another reason to further ease its grip on credit and lower interest rates .
example.arg: which -> The new reports of sluggishness
by an earlier Labor Department report that manufacturing payrolls dropped by 105,000 in September

example.name: all args
example.text: While Friday 's plunging stock market prompted new fears about the economy 's prospects , a little - known indicator that [*T*-1] has faithfully foreshadowed the economy 's ups and downs by exceptionally long lead times points to a sustained rise in overall business activity .

roleset.note: FORESHADOW-V NOTES: Frames file for 'foreshadow' based on sentences in wsj. No access to verbnet at the moment. (from foreshadow.01-v predicate notes)
